entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
